header.title: The cdv program

comref.comsummary: Script to start the Crashdump Viewer from the OS command line.

description.p: The cdv shell script is located in directory priv of the Observer application. The script is used for starting the Crashdump Viewer tool from the OS command line.
For Windows users, cdv.bat is found in the same location.

func.name: cdv [file]
func.fsummary: Start the Crashdump Viewer and load the given file.

desc.p: Argument file is optional. If not specified, a file dialog is displayed, allowing you to select a crashdump from the file system.
